features: COMPACT YET POWERFUL: 700 watts of power and 0.7 cu. ft. inside allow for effective, efficient cooking while not taking up valuable kitchen space; glass turntable rotates for optimum cooking
FLEXIBLE INSTALLATION: Freestanding microwave can also be installed underneath the cabinet with optional hanging kit, freeing up counter space
CONVENIENT CONTROLS: Simple, one-touch operation with Instant On express cooking controls and multiple cooking modes; kitchen timer, child lock controls and cooking complete alarms add convenience
EASY AUTO OR MANUAL DEFROST: Defrosting times and power levels can be programmed or set manually for optimal results
SOLID, SLEEK DESIGN: Clean lines, electronic keypad and white color with black glass construction provide elevated design
body.description: A space-saving microwave oven with multiple installation methods, the GE� 0.7 Cu. Ft. Capacity Countertop Microwave Oven provides quality, convenience and style for any kitchen. The 700-watt oven is a compact size but still powerful enough to quickly cook popcorn, heat you to install under cabinetry, saving valuable counter space. Convenience cooking controls, defrost controls and Instant On one-touch controls make operation quick and easy. White color and clean lines bring understated sophistication to any kitchen d�cor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our purpose - We rise to the challenge of building a world that works. GE’s people are diverse and dedicated, operating with the highest level of integrity and focus to fulfill GE’s mission and deliver for its customers. GE brings to market innovative solutions that deliver essential energy, healthcare and transportation infrastructure. We work with the highest integrity, compliance culture and respect for human rights while also reducing the impact of our technology. GE has pioneered technologies that have spurred world-transforming changes and improved the lives of billions. Together, these moments trace an arc of innovation that has no parallel—a commitment to progress that will help propel a brighter future for the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mini Microwave
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this microwave after moving from a house into an apartment. I previously had a full size over the range GE microwave but downsized to this mini version because my kitchen is so tiny now. This one has the exact same key pad which is awesome because I really liked the previous keypad. This is just large enough to fit one dinner plate inside which is good enough because really, all I use a micro for is to cook frozen dinners and heat cold food. I haven’t noticed much difference in how it cooks/heats as I automatically leave it on a little longer to make up for the decreased power. Works good and takes up very little counter space. I saved quite a bit by ordering the “used” version which looks brand new to me. I feel that I did well with this deal and am happy with my new microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good not the best
reviews.reviewText: It’s a small microwave so you can’t expect a whole lot BUT the size is perfect. I built in a cabinet set since we placed a hood over the oven and I didn’t want a huge microwave so initially bought one of these. It lasted about 2 years before the inside started cracking .Pros :Size works for costum built cabinetsConsWon’t last more than a year or twoIt’s fairly low output so don’t expect quick reheats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small, fits where I needed it to. But it's low wattage.
reviews.reviewText: I have decided to install inside a cabinet. Fits perfect. Looks great. Barely fits out dinner plates. That's not a bad thing. I feel like the lower wattage may be safer for us? I don't know. But it just takes longer to cook. Getting used to it. It's just. It the best microwave. Happy to not take up the whole counter. It's a trade off. Cook longer. Typical left overs would take 2:30 with an older microwave. I run it 3:00 - 3:30 now. Oh well. It's a nice microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not come with "Optional Hanging Kit"
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I want an under my cabinet hanging Microwave. The product description for this microwave says "optional hanging kit included" It is not included. The pictures at the bottom of the page include an example of the microwave hanging under a cabinet. In the Q&A, a GE representative says that the microwave is not designed to hang under a cabinet, and that would be dangers. That is not right. There are some places in the top of the microwave to have screws from the bracket screw into the top of the microwave. I have had GE Spacesaver microwaves in the past, and they come with a couple of metal bars to distribute the microwaves weight. (Wholes in the wrong place for this smaller model).the Q&A section does not seem to allow new questions.If I don't hear back from someone in a couple of days, explaining how get the included hanging kit, I will return the microwave.Suggestions on how to correctly ask for help appreciated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Under the Counter mountable
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this as a replacement for the same model I purchased 2016 (see images). It is still working fine, but the inside is melting and rusting - BUMMER! It's small and works well for heating water/coffee or leftovers. I rebought because it's the only one I can find that is small and mounts under a cabinet (with a mounting kit).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had this model before! They last forever., easy to program, good heat,great deal!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Small Microwave that doesn't Beep. A little Loud when running.
reviews.reviewText: We just got our microwave yesterday. I will update if we have any problems with it in the future.The annoying Beeping can be silenced and once silenced it doesn't make a single beep. This is GREAT.It is a small microwave with a maximized interior space. I don't understand some of the answers in questions on this product. I have plates that measure 10.25" diameter (Round) and they fit in this microwave just fine. The interior is very similar to our last small microwave, but the exterior is smaller, which is great.It is good for small spaces. Unlike many other small microwaves, it does not require 12" of clearance above the microwave, so you can set it on a counter underneath a cabinet, or mount it to the cabinet. We set ours on the counter. It requires 1" clearance in the back and 3" clearance on either side.It has an incandescent bulb inside, which is good for light sensitive people, and green LED numbers on the front. The numbers do flash if you open the door before the cycle is complete and they continue to flash.I am noise sensitive, so maybe most people won't notice, but this microwave is significantly louder while running than our last microwave. In my book, the lack of beeping and the counter space more than make up for that though.Overall we are really happy with our new microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small but highly efficient and attractive microwave ! Very pleased. Was not pleased, however, that the large box was left underneath my mailbox by the road instead of by garage or on my front porch! Very lazy delivery service person!!!
Dislike the small size but that’s all the space we hadLiked the power of this small microwave
Perfect size for small space. Very practical

This product is so incredibly noisy that operating it would qualify as noise pollution. Decided to take it to the local garbage dump as returning it would be environmentally unfriendly on so many levels. Besides I inadvertently discarded packaging materials before operating it, so probably out of luck for a return anyway!

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t buy. Cheap door latch. Breaks easily
reviews.reviewText: A few months after the year warranty, the door latch broke so I’m unable to open the door and use the microwave. Very annoying. Hoping to hear from manufacturer about a replacement if in fact it’s fixable.Other than that the appliance has worked well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than the picture shown on Amazon.
reviews.reviewText: Beware, this item is sold by a third party from the US and GE Canada won't honor the warranty because the product comes from the US and GE USA won't honor the warranty because the item was sold by Amazon.ca.It happened to me when the microwave oven malfunctioned within the first year of this useless warranty. Stay away from this product, it's basically sold without warranty!
